title: Refferal not showing up as completed
body: i referred my brother to league yesterday and he isn't showing up as a completed invitation? i reffered a friend a couple years ago and he is showing up as completed, so yeah. any ideas?

replies.body:
I'm not seeing any referrals on your account from yesterday, which might mean that your brother didn't type your name in when he created the account.  If that is the case, we wouldn't be able to add the referral retroactively.  However, it can take a few days for the system to update so it could also just be that.  

Make sure you go to your RAF page to doublecheck: http://rewards.na.leagueoflegends.com/

If you write into support with his Summoner name/username, we can check it out there.
thanks for the reply, so i checked again and now the referal is showing up. but his name is invisible and it says that he's only level 1. does it take time to update or something?

That referral has never logged in, so a Summoner name doesn't exist for it.

I do see that you also have a few referrals from LAN, but keep in mind the program will only work for regions that have the program activated. 

You can find all that information here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751884-Refer-a-Friend
I was under the impression that referrals only 'count' once the referred played reaches level 10.

Heya
Wait some time. If nothing happens after that talk to the support.

Regards Rkoturdo
